titles.title: Energy Efficient Appliance Tax Credit for Washers and Dryers Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals and businesses a credit against income tax for the purchase of Energy Star compliant clothes washers and dryers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/14/2007--Introduced. Energy Efficient Appliance Tax Credit for Washers and Dryers Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for 25% of the cost (up to $500) of clothes washers and dryers which meet requirements for the Energy Star program. Terminates such credit after 2016.
